thread.title: Global economy: weaker numbers worsen trade worries

title: Global economy: weaker numbers worsen trade worries
text:
Global economy: weaker numbers worsen trade worries 01:52
Manufacturing activity remained relatively solid in major Asian economies in April, but exports showed signs of weakness across the region, and new euro zone data also hints at slowing momentum. It's a worrying development given heightened Sino-U.S. trade tensions. David Pollard reports.
